sentences.sContent: Include your ferret's medical records and veterinarian information in the package.
sentences.sContent_eng: Include your ferret's medical records and veterinarian information in the package.
sentences.sCn: 救济包里面记得包含貂儿的医疗记录和兽医的信息。

sentences.sContent: This is not normally an issue that needs professional treatment by a veterinarian.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is not normally an issue that needs professional treatment by a veterinarian.
sentences.sCn: 小小的崩坏通常不需要兽医来为貂儿提供专业的诊疗。

trans.tranOther: someone who is trained to give medical care and treatment to sick animals
